00037     protected static final String ELEM_ALIGNMENTML = "alignmentML";
00038     protected static final String ELEM_ALIGNMENT = "alignment";
00039     protected static final String ELEM_SEQUENCE = "sequence";
00040     protected static final String ELEM_NAME = "name";
00041     protected static final String ELEM_SYNONYMS = "synonyms";
00042     protected static final String ELEM_DESCRIPTION = "description";
00043     protected static final String ELEM_ALIGNEDAMINOACIDSEQUENCE = "alignedAminoAcidSequence";
00044     protected static final String ELEM_ALIGNEDNUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE = "alignedNucleicAcidSequence";
00045     protected static final String ELEM_ALIGNEDFREESEQUENCE = "alignedFreeSequence";
00046     protected static final String ELEM_CROSSREFS = "crossrefs";
00047     protected static final String ELEM_COMMENT = "comment";
00048 
00049     // xml attributes
00050     protected static final String ATT_VERSION = "version";
00051     protected static final String ATT_SCORE = "score";
00052     protected static final String ATT_SEQID = "seqID";
00053 
00054     // string patterns
00055     protected static final String PATTERN_LOWERCASE = "[a-z]+";
00056     protected static final String PATTERN_NUCLEICACID = "^[A|C|G|U|T|R|Y|M|K|S|W|H|B|V|D|N|X|-]+$";
00057     protected static final String PATTERN_AMINOACID = "^[A|R|N|D|C|Q|E|G|H|I|L|K|M|F|P|S|T|U|W|Y|V|-]+$";
00058     protected static final String PATTERN_FREE = ".+";
00059 
00060     // prepare patterns for parsing input
00061     protected static final Pattern lcPattern = Pattern.compile(PATTERN_LOWERCASE);
00062     protected static final Pattern naPattern = Pattern.compile(PATTERN_NUCLEICACID);
00063     protected static final Pattern aaPattern = Pattern.compile(PATTERN_AMINOACID);
00064     protected static final Pattern fsPattern = Pattern.compile(PATTERN_FREE);

00175     public AlignmentML(String catalogpropertyfile, Document submitted_dom, BioDOMWarningBox warningBox)
00176             throws BioDOMException {
00177         super(catalogpropertyfile);
00178         isNillable = true;
00179         if (warningBox != null) {
00180             this.setWarningBox(warningBox);
00181         }
00182         if (submitted_dom != null) {
00183             this.setDom(submitted_dom);
00184         } else {
00185             initDOM();
00186         }
00187     }

00260 
00261     /*
00262      * (non-Javadoc)
00263      * 
00264      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.AlignmentMLInterface#appendClustal(java.io.Reader,
00265      *      java.lang.Integer, int)
00266      */
00267     public void appendClustal(final Reader clustal, final Integer score, final int seqtype) throws BioDOMException {
00268         try {
00269             // some local variables
00270             boolean first = true;
00271             final HashMap<String, StringBuffer> aln = new HashMap<String, StringBuffer>();
00272             final LineNumberReader br = new LineNumberReader(clustal);
00273             String current = null;
00274 
00275             // parse clustal String
00276             while ((current = br.readLine()) != null) {
00277 
00278                 // first line must starts with CLUSTAL
00279                 if (first) {
00280                     if (current.startsWith("CLUSTAL")) {
00281                         // this is correct
00282                         first = false;
00283                     } else {
00284                         // error! first line must start with CLUSTAL
00285                         log.severe("Error (line:" + br.getLineNumber() + ")! Invalid clustal string :'" + current
00286                                 + "'!");
00287                         throw new BioDOMException("Error(line:" + br.getLineNumber() + ")! Invalid clustal string :'"
00288                                 + current + "'!");
00289                     }
00290                 } else {
00291                     if (current.trim().matches("\\w+\\s+[a-zA-Z[-]]+")) {
00292                         log.config("matching line (" + br.getLineNumber() + "):'" + current + "'");
00293                         // remove duplicate spaces
00294                         final String[] l = current.split("\\s+");
00295                         if (aln.containsKey(l[0])) {
00296                             aln.get(l[0]).append(l[1]);
00297                         } else {
00298                             aln.put(l[0], new StringBuffer(l[1]));
00299                         }
00300                     } else {
00301                         log.config("line (" + br.getLineNumber() + ") does not match:'" + current + "'");
00302                     }
00303                 }
00304             }
00305 
00306             // generate DOMTree
00307             final Element alignment = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNMENT);
00308             if (score != null) {
00309                 alignment.setAttributeNS(null, ATT_SCORE, score.toString());
00310             }
00311             for (String id : aln.keySet()) {
00312                 final Element sequence = addAlignment(id, null, aln.get(id).toString(), seqtype);
00313                 alignment.appendChild(sequence);
00314             }
00315             final Element root = dom.getDocumentElement();
00316             root.appendChild(alignment);
00317             // close stream
00318             br.close();
00319         } catch (IOException e) {
00320             log.severe("IOException occurred while reading from clustal reader" + System.getProperty("line.separator")
00321                     + e.getMessage());
00322             throw new BioDOMException("IOException occurred while reading from clustal reader"
00323                     + System.getProperty("line.separator") + e.getMessage());
00324         }
00325 
00326     }

00397     /*
00398      * (non-Javadoc)
00399      * 
00400      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.AlignmentMLInterface#appendFastaAsAlignment(java.io.Reader,
00401      *      java.lang.Integer, int)
00402      */
00403     public void appendFastaAsAlignment(final Reader fasta, final Integer score, final int seqType)
00404             throws BioDOMException {
00405 
00406         // create empty alignment element
00407         final Element alignmentML = dom.getDocumentElement();
00408         final Element alignment = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNMENT);
00409         alignmentML.appendChild(alignment);
00410 
00411         // adding alignment score (if given)
00412         if (score != null) {
00413             alignment.setAttributeNS(null, ATT_SCORE, Integer.toString(score));
00414         }
00415         // read Fasta line by line using a BufferedReader
00416         final LineNumberReader br = new LineNumberReader(fasta);
00417         String line = null;
00418         StringBuffer sequenceBuffer = new StringBuffer();
00419         String id = null;
00420         String description = null;
00421 
00422         try {
00423             while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
00424                 if (line.equals("")) {
00425                     // skip empty line! exception otherwise!
00426                     log.warning("Empty line detected. Skipping empty line!");
00427                     warningBox.appendWarning(this, "Empty line detected. Skipping empty line!");
00428                 } else {
00429                     if (line.charAt(0) != '>') { // if line does NOT start
00430                                                     // with ">"
00431                         // assuming it's contains sequence
00432                         // information
00433                         if (id != null) {
00434                             sequenceBuffer = sequenceBuffer.append(line);
00435                         } else {
00436                             throw new BioDOMException("line " + br.getLineNumber()
00437                                     + ": No id before aligned sequence starts!");
00438                         }
00439                     } else { // line start with ">" or it is the last line
00440                         // if any id exists, we've parsed an sequence before and
00441                         // can
00442                         // add it to current dom
00443                         if (id != null) {
00444                             alignment.appendChild(addAlignment(id, description, sequenceBuffer.toString(), seqType));
00445                             sequenceBuffer = new StringBuffer();
00446                         }
00447                         // removing leading whitespaces and get id and
00448                         // description
00449                         final String[] idDesc = line.substring(1).trim().split(" ", 2);
00450                         // get id
00451                         if (idDesc.length > 0) {
00452                             id = idDesc[0];
00453                         } else {
00454                             id = generateId();
00455                             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "line " + br.getLineNumber()
00456                                     + ": aligned sequence has no ID! Creating a unique ID!\n");
00457                         }
00458                         // get description if given
00459                         if (idDesc.length > 1) {
00460                             description = idDesc[1];
00461                         } else {
00462                             description = null;
00463                         }
00464                     }
00465                 }
00466               
00467             }
00468             /* if sequenceBuffer ist empty, we have an empty sequence and
00469                therefore throw an exception... */
00470             if (sequenceBuffer.length() == 0)
00471                 throw new BioDOMException("aligned sequence contains no sequence information (empty sequence)!");
00472             /* ...otherwise, the last sequence contains sequence information, so
00473             we add the last sequence */
00474             alignment.appendChild(addAlignment(id, description, sequenceBuffer.toString(), seqType));
00475             // close reader
00476             br.close();
00477         } catch (IOException e) {
00478             log.severe("IOException occurred while reading from fasta reader" + System.getProperty("line.separator")
00479                     + e.getMessage());
00480             throw new BioDOMException("IOException occurred while reading from fasta reader"
00481                     + System.getProperty("line.separator") + e.getMessage());
00482         }
00483 
00484     }

00495     /*
00496      * (non-Javadoc)
00497      * 
00498      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.AlignmentMLInterface#toFasta(int)
00499      */
00500     public String toFasta(final int no) throws BioDOMException {
00501         // try {
00502         if (!this.validate()) {
00503             return null;
00504         }
00505         // parse to fasta
00506         StringBuffer fasta = new StringBuffer();
00507         final Element alignment = (Element) dom.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_ALIGNMENT).item(no);
00508         final NodeList sequences = alignment.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00509         char [] tmpfasta;
00510         for (int i = 0; i < sequences.getLength(); i++) {
00511             final Element sequence = (Element) sequences.item(i);
00512 
00513             // adding sequence id
00514             fasta = fasta.append(">").append(sequence.getAttributeNS(null, ATT_SEQID).replaceAll(" ", ""));
00515 
00516             // adding description
00517             if (sequence.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_DESCRIPTION).getLength() > 0) {
00518                 final String description = getTextContent(sequence.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_DESCRIPTION).item(0));
00519                 if (description != null) {
00520                     fasta = fasta.append(" ").append(description);
00521                 }
00522             }
00523             // adding newline
00524             fasta = fasta.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));
00525 
00526             // adding sequence
00527             if (sequence.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_ALIGNEDNUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE).getLength() > 0) {
00528                 tmpfasta = getTextContent(sequence.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_ALIGNEDNUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE)
00529                         .item(0)).toCharArray();
00530 
00531             } else if (sequence.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_ALIGNEDAMINOACIDSEQUENCE).getLength() > 0) {
00532                 tmpfasta = getTextContent(sequence.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_ALIGNEDAMINOACIDSEQUENCE).item(0)).toCharArray();
00533  
00534             } else  {
00535                 tmpfasta = getTextContent(sequence.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_ALIGNEDFREESEQUENCE).item(0)).toCharArray();
00536         
00537             } 
00538             
00539             /* TODO: Add a more efficient method for line-wrapping the sequences (than char-by-char)!! */
00540             //define line length
00541             final int wrapwidth = 72;
00542             for (int cp = 0; cp < tmpfasta.length; cp++) {
00543                 // append next character
00544                 fasta.append(tmpfasta[cp]);
00545                 // if we've appended the linebreaking number of characters,
00546                 // append a newline...
00547                 if (((cp + 1) % wrapwidth) == 0) {
00548                     fasta = fasta.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));
00549                 }
00550             }
00551             
00552             if (i != sequences.getLength() - 1) {// a new seq will be
00553                                                     // appended
00554                 fasta = fasta.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));
00555             }
00556         }
00557         return fasta.toString();
00558     }
00559 
00560     // ////////////////////////////////
00561     // //// Private Methods
00562     // ////////////////////////////////
00566     private void initDOM() {
00567         dom = DB.newDocument();
00568         final Element root = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNMENTML);
00569         root
00570                 .setAttributeNS(XMLConstants.W3C_XML_SCHEMA_INSTANCE_NS_URI, "schemaLocation", NAMESPACE + " "
00571                         + NSLOCATION);
00572         dom.appendChild(root);
00573         dom.normalizeDocument();
00574         log.config("DOM ready...");
00575     }
00576 
00589     private Element addAlignment(final String id, final String description, String sequence, final int seqType)
00590             throws BioDOMException {
00591 
00592         // check for lowercase and warn&convert on match
00593         if (lcPattern.matcher(sequence).find()) {
00594             log.warning("Lowercase characters not valid in AlignmentML - converting to Uppercase");
00595             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "Lowercase characters not valid in AlignmentML - converting to Uppercase");
00596             sequence = sequence.toUpperCase();
00597         }
00598 
00599         // creating sequence element
00600         final Element sequenceElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00601         // setting id
00602         sequenceElem.setAttributeNS(null, ATT_SEQID, id);
00603 
00604         // adding description element
00605         if (description != null) {
00606             final Element descriptionElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_DESCRIPTION);
00607             descriptionElem.setTextContent(description);
00608             sequenceElem.appendChild(descriptionElem);
00609         }
00610         // checking sequence type and adding sequence
00611         // AlignedAminoAcidSequence
00612         if (seqType == AMINOACID) {
00613             if (!aaPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) {
00614                 throw new BioDOMException("Error! Unallowed char (allowed pattern: " + PATTERN_AMINOACID
00615                         + " ) in aminoacidsequence '" + sequence + "'!");
00616             }
00617             final Element alignedAminoSeqElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNEDAMINOACIDSEQUENCE);
00618             alignedAminoSeqElem.setTextContent(sequence);
00619             sequenceElem.appendChild(alignedAminoSeqElem);
00620             // AlignedNucleicAcidSequence
00621         } else if (seqType == NUCLEICACID) {
00622             if (!naPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) {
00623                 throw new BioDOMException("Error! Unallowed char (allowed pattern: " + PATTERN_NUCLEICACID
00624                         + " ) in nucleicacidsequence '" + sequence + "'!");
00625             }
00626             final Element alignedNucleicSeqElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNEDNUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE);
00627             alignedNucleicSeqElem.setTextContent(sequence);
00628             sequenceElem.appendChild(alignedNucleicSeqElem);
00629             // AlignedFreeSequence
00630         } else if (seqType == FREE) {
00631             if (!fsPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) {
00632                 throw new BioDOMException("Error! Unallowed char (allowed pattern: " + PATTERN_FREE
00633                         + " ) in freesequence '" + sequence + "'!");
00634             }
00635             final Element alignedFreeSeqElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNEDFREESEQUENCE);
00636             alignedFreeSeqElem.setTextContent(sequence);
00637             sequenceElem.appendChild(alignedFreeSeqElem);
00638         } else if (seqType == UNKNOWNSEQUENCE) {
00639             if (!aaPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) { // unallowed char ->
00640                                                             // free sequence
00641                 final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNEDFREESEQUENCE);
00642                 sequenceElem.appendChild(eSeq);
00643                 eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00644             } else if (!naPattern.matcher(sequence).matches()) { // aminoacid
00645                                                                     // (contains
00646                                                                     // chars
00647                                                                     // that are
00648                                                                     // only
00649                                                                     // allowed
00650                                                                     // in
00651                                                                     // aminoacid
00652                 final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNEDAMINOACIDSEQUENCE);
00653                 sequenceElem.appendChild(eSeq);
00654                 eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00655             } else { // aminoacid or nucleicacid? -> depends on percentage of
00656                         // ACGTU (current >= 90%)
00657                 final String uSeq = sequence.toUpperCase();
00658                 int cnt = 0, length = uSeq.length();
00659                 for (int j = 0; j < uSeq.length(); j++) {
00660                     final char c = uSeq.charAt(j);
00661                     switch (c) {
00662                     case '-':
00663                         length--;
00664                         break;
00665                     case 'A':
00666                     case 'C':
00667                     case 'G':
00668                     case 'T':
00669                     case 'U':
00670                         cnt++;
00671                         break;
00672                     }
00673                 }
00674                 if ((double) cnt / (double) length >= 0.9) { // over 90% of
00675                                                                 // sequence are
00676                                                                 // ACGTU ->
00677                                                                 // probably
00678                                                                 // nucleicacid
00679                     final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNEDNUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE);
00680                     sequenceElem.appendChild(eSeq);
00681                     eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00682                     warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No sequence type defined. Determined sequence as Nucleicacid");
00683                 } else { // over 10% of sequence are not ACGTU -> probably
00684                             // aminoacid
00685                     final Element eSeq = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_ALIGNEDAMINOACIDSEQUENCE);
00686                     sequenceElem.appendChild(eSeq);
00687                     eSeq.appendChild(dom.createTextNode(sequence));
00688                     warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No sequence type defined. Determined sequence as Aminoacid");
00689                 }
00690             }
00691 
00692             // Error -> Invalid sequence type
00693         } else {
00694             log.config("appendFastaAsAlignment: unknown sequence type!");
00695             throw new BioDOMException("Error! Invalid sequence type commited!");
00696         }
00697         return sequenceElem;
00698     }
00699 
00700 }
Generated on Tue Nov 7 15:25:16 2006 for biodom by  1.4.5
